segments.text: Whoa, that water's really pouring over the sink edge now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect the faucet to be left on like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's totally zoned out on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress is getting splashed, and she doesn't flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at the boy, he's almost got the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's leaning backâ€” that's precarious!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's so excited, palm up like a beggar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're pulling off this heist right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a perfect garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how unaware she is of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle's widening fast on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in a splashy mess any minute.
segments.speaker: PAR
